verses.name: Genesis 32:1
verses.text: And Jacob went on his way, and the angels of God met him.

verses.name: Genesis 32:2
verses.text: And when Jacob saw them, he said, This is God’s host: and he called the name of that place Mahanaim.

verses.name: Genesis 32:3
verses.text: And Jacob sent messengers before him to Esau his brother unto the land of Seir, the country of Edom.

verses.name: Genesis 32:4
verses.text: And he commanded them, saying, Thus shall ye speak unto my lord Esau; Thy servant Jacob saith thus, I have sojourned with Laban, and stayed there until now:
